website_summaries.verdict: The Apple Mac Pro (2013) is a powerhouse in a surprisingly small package, leveraging innovative design and extreme connectivity to completely re-imagine the professional desktop workstation.
pros: Dramatic departure from boring, boxy designs
Powerful performance thanks to Intel Xeon E5 processor and dual AMD FirePro graphics
Supports multiple simultaneous 4K video streams, and a wealth of external expansion options
Lots of ports, with 6 Thunderbolt 2 ports
cons: Expensive, even for an Apple product
No internal access to processor or graphics cards

customer_reviews.title: Very fast for music production
customer_reviews.text: This is used in my digital recording studio. Lots of external things plugged into it. All USB plugs are used and a powered hub with about 6 other devices. Several MIDI Keyboards via USB, Thunderbolt ports are in use. USB mixer/interface, Apollo Twin interface, Presonus Faderport 16 interface all running into Studio One 4 Pro. Nothing has slowed it down yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've been a huge fan of Apple for most of my life. When my old Mac Pro (the giant steel tower that could take over the world on any given day) started wearing out after ten years of heavy use, I looked into the new Mac Pros. Bought this one for $3,500, assuming it would do everything the old system did. I was very wrong. To this day (five years later) it still sputters, crashes, freezes, and generally fails to run all the programs I was used to running (Final Cut Express, Microsoft Office, etc.). I definitely get the feeling that Apple is moving away from computing, which is unfortunate. They were forerunners for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Great macpro, that make my works better than ever. my spec 3.0GHz 8-Core Intel Xeon E5, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD
customer_reviews.author: hanrenwei

customer_reviews.title: It worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Old reliable MacPro product that has aged, but performs well for video processing.
customer_reviews.author: CHG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Blazingly fast, rock-solid stable (not surprising for a Mac), and so incredibly quiet. Yes, it's pricey but my last Mac Pro lasted 6 years and I sold it for about half what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!! Use it for music and video production. Very quiet. Very fast. Very easy to upgrade RAM. I use 3 ext Hard Drives set up in various formats for storage, back up and speedy streaming. Great for greenscreening and multicam hd video editing with FCP 10.1. It is expensive, but good value for money if you can afford it (IMHO).
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, just what we needed for some high ...
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, just what we needed for some high end video work. Amazon had them in stock when no one else did and I got next day delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dalzell

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Workhorse. Simply stunning how fast this is. We are running 8 displays from this at 4 separate resolutions. Simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded to 10.9.3 and I have this running with a dell ultraHD UP2414Q@60Hz, working like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Gisselly Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Very fast machine and the cool factor is right up there as well
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully constructed and fast computer but you would expect that from Apple at this price. If you need fast and can afford it (along with the necessary external drives) I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Slawski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Performance as expected from Apple, but cheaper from this vendor!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny U

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with my purchase. super fast processing.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Gates

customer_reviews.title: WON'T TURN ON AFTER THE THIRD DAY OF HAVING IT ...
customer_reviews.text: WON'T TURN ON AFTER THE THIRD DAY OF HAVING IT. I WANT REFUNDED AND GO TO THE DIRECT SOURCE WHICH I SHOULD HAVE DONE IN THE BEGINNING, STRAIGHT TO THE APPLE STORE HERE I COME!!!
customer_reviews.author: TYCOON

customer_reviews.title: Hopeless
customer_reviews.text: I could not use much time . After 3 months no power and I send apple certified service center and they said cannot repaired. Big loss for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed shakyb

customer_reviews.title: Three years old right off the shelf
customer_reviews.text: In reflecting back on purchasing this: it is a mixed bag, so I took some stars off as the limitations became apparent. No. 1 the attachments are limited, you may have to change some gear if you want to use it. My major criticism is that the technology is 3 years old. That is critical in today's market. I can see keeping the same model but the tech should be updated and improved year to year, even if they are little or minor imchrements. Nice machine but remember it is three years old, even if you buy tomorrow. You don't buy too many things that are three years old right off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy one of these - get a loaded Mini for half the price.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a somewhat old Cheesegrater MacPro which had been going since 2008. Second time to the Apple Store for repair today - freeze on boot with s possible video issues also. The previous time they "reseated the RAM" and pronounced it good. It lasted 4 weeks, The same freeze on boot problems - tried various combinations of recovery without any success. When it got to the Apple Store this time, it wouldn't even start and the "genius" gave up and started a work order. Should have bought a Mini Thank goodness we still have the old machine
customer_reviews.author: Peter J. Neame

customer_reviews.title: 12 core Mac Pro
customer_reviews.text: I have a fully loaded 12 core D700 setup and it's the absolute best for video editing.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Films

customer_reviews.title: TRASHCAN-look a like
customer_reviews.text: People keep confusing it for a trash can at my job.. its not a trash can, people.

customer_reviews.title: Apple rocks.
customer_reviews.text: i havent bought the maching yet but im gonig to. And when i do im going to buy one with all the upgrades. I will spend the $15,000 for it without a blink in my eye. However, i will buy it from Apple and not amazon. im pretty stoked cant wait to get my hands on it and use it.

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best trash can I've ever bought. It fits on my desk and holds quite a bit. Would buy again A+++

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Significantly more expensive than similarly spec'd machines not marketed by the fruit company. Would not recommend. Would most definitely not buy (again).
customer_reviews.author: Yac

customer_reviews.title: Done w/APPLE .... YET ANOTHER TERRIBLE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Short review : I do not Recommend this,Or any Apple products WHY? I have had Multiple Apple products, Macbook pro,This,iPhone,and iPad. I have had 2 MacBook pro's,Both i had Major issues with. I have had SUPREME lag,Where I a youtube video will make my MacBook pro s*** down all of a sudden, And mostly,Compatibility issues. ALL APPLE PRODUCTS are not compatible with much, So consider things like, Your camera,Phone,Printer,USB's,Hard Drives, SSD cards,And Customization are all things you can not DO/USE on a Mac. DONT BUY FROM APPLE!
customer_reviews.author: Jevyn

product_meta.title: Apple Mac Pro Desktop (3.5GHz 6-Core Intel Xeon E5, 16GB RAM, 256GB Flash) - Black
feature_bullets: Macos Mojave inspired by pros but designed for everyone, with dark mode, stacks, easier screenshots, new built-in apps, and more
